bike.description: 6011 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe & chainstays, co-molded carbon seatstays, cold-forged dropouts, G2 Geometry

components.description: RockShox Tora 302 Solo Air, 120mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound adjustment, Lockout
Shimano M495 CenterLock disc hubs, Bontrager Ranger disc rims, 32h
Bontrager SSR Riser, 25mm rise, 620mm width, 6d backsweep
Shimano M486, hydraulic disc, 185mm front/160mm rear CenterLock rotors
